title: 1979–80 Hellenic Football League
text:
The 1979–80 Hellenic Football League season was the 27th in the history of the <a href="Hellenic%20Football%20League">Hellenic Football League</a>, a <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition in England.
Premier Division.
The Premier Division featured twelve clubs which competed in the division last season, along with four new clubs.
